name: Tiny Pottery in the Big World
description: Step into the world of tiny pottery! In this playful, hands-on workshop, each participant will be provided a miniature pottery wheel, clay, tools, and underglazes. After a brief demo and instruction, you’ll get to create your own tiny ceramic pieces—perfect for beginners and anyone curious about working small. Your finished creations will be glazed, kiln-fired, and ready for pickup within two weeks. No experience needed—just bring your curiosity and appreciation for all things mini! This workshop includes all supplies, is beginner-friendly, offers instruction by a local ceramic artist, and you'll take home 2–5 mini pieces.
